version_description: We have taken into account all the comments during soft launch, and prepared the ultimate version for you!

Fixed crash when installed over the legacy version.
Fixed banner overlap under certain circumstances.
Major update on its way!

Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Reduced ads frequency.
Thank you for supporting Brutal Hockey and prepare for the new content!

Introduced Hardcore Tournaments: +15 Extra Devil-may-care Cups!
Many thanks for supporting Brutal Hockey; this allows us to bring you more content!

Fixed occasional crash on legacy devices.
Minor bug fixes and improvements.

Introduced "player lock" feature: automatic player switching can now be disabled during gameplay whenever preferred!
Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Optimized ad placement upon players' request.

Introduced long-awaited 4v4 Pro League!
Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Many thanks for supporting Brutal Hockey - this allows us to bring you more content!
Fixed compatibility with the newest iPhone SE.

• AI improvements in Hardcore League (all players are affected by obstacles now);
• IAP now removes also non-optional ads to avoid any confusions.

• Introduced frequently requested REAL-TIME MULTIPLAYER mode, allowing you to go up against real players from around the world!
• Introduced unlockable and outrageously punchy Hockey Superstars you can enforce your Team with!
We revised your favourite Hockey to ensure compatibility with the latest devices.
